ENGLISH: §ZCult of the Eldritch Ones:§! AI Initiative
The AI cultist behave normal and have the same chances of success as the players.
The AI cultists will always fail to trigger important and world-changing events, player intervention is needed.
The AI cultist have increased chances of success compared to the player.
§ZCult of the Eldritch Ones:§! Startup Cult Population
The cult will already exist in the world and be populated by the AI.
The player will have to found the cult.
The cult will not exist at game start, but the AI might found and start populating the cult. (Influenced by AI Initiative)

The Eldritch Gods are beings from a different world, seeking to enter and conquer this one. There are dozen if not hundreds of Eldritch Things, and while individual followers might have favorites, believers of the Eldritch Gods follow, pray and beckon to all of them as a collective pantheon.
Favor is respected by the acolytes and the some say the eldritch gods themselves. Like Prestige, it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.

Aisura is the Queen of the Dead and seeks to devour those who are lost and unworthy. She appears a winged androgynous humanoid with four arms and sometimes two faces. Her followers pray to her to not be devoured and in most cases to devour those they deem unworthy or false believers, while few truly fanatical wish to be devoured by her.

Naahab is the Eldritch Thing of knowledge and the master of all Ylsiths. He, or rather it, appears as a gigantic brain with a single eye, enveloped by a great mass of tentacles with a purple gleam. Its followers are seekers of knowledge first and foremost, even if that search will kill them. The ultimate goal for every follower is to be fed to and fuse with Naahab and let him absorb all the accumulated knowledge.

Qushakon is the Eldritch Thing and undisputed ruler of the deep. He appears as a swirling, black vortex in the shape of a great serpent, slithering through the unknown darkness. While his domain is the deep dark sea, he can travel through any unknown darkness, no matter the element. For him and his followers, all that are unworthy are prey to be tormented and devoured.

The Cult of the Eldritch is the body of cultists and agents in this dimension, that work towards the awakening of their Eldritch Ones. Working in the shadows, the cults goal is twofold: Awaken the Old Ones and gain enough secular power to overthrow the believers of the false gods and create a great earthly realm from which the Old One's power can emanate from.
Must be in good standing with the cult.
The Master of the Cult of the Eldritch is not only guiding the efforts of the cult to awaken the Old Ones, he's also demanding complete obedience from the other members.
As the weight of your furtive knowledge starts to weight on you, cracks to show.
A great interest (and some might call it dangerous obsession) in the Occult and the Weird.
This character is currently away, investigating strange rumors.
Set out by yourself to spread the truth about these awesome Eldritch beings.

You have collected enough proof and insight to be sure of one thing, the Eldritch Gods are real, and they are out there and their power is immense. [Root.TrueReligion.GetName] and [Root.TrueReligion.GetHighGodName] are a lie. The only hope and salvation lies in serving the Eldritch Gods.
